definition: curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)

sentences.english: Cable-net curtain wall will be erected under the cooperation of indoor and outdoor scaffoldings.
sentences.chinese: 索网幕墙通过室内外脚手架配合进行安装。

sentences.english: The normal method of curtain-wall glass design is systematically elaborated.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分为幕墙玻璃板加权残值法分析计算。

sentences.english: A new transparent glass facade encloses the new commercial space on the side.
sentences.chinese: 一种新的透明玻璃幕墙包围就在旁边的新的商业空间。
是玻璃幕墙高耸入云的闹市区？

sentences.english: Full-height glazing on this level provides views over the perimeter wall to the lake beyond.
sentences.chinese: 上层的全玻璃幕墙提供了到湖边的视野。

sentences.english: Glass-wall cleaning robot is one of robots for limited operation, which can walk on vertical glass-wall with washing devices.
sentences.chinese: 高楼玻璃幕墙清洗机器人是特种机器人的一个分支。

sentences.english: The pressure equalized rain-screen (PER) walls were exactly proposed in this context.
sentences.chinese: 等压雨幕墙正是在这一背景下诞生的。

sentences.english: Presents the research background and structure of a double-skin facade.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了双层皮玻璃幕墙的研究背景及构造。

sentences.english: A finite analysis calculation method of the glass curtain wall strut-cable structure is presented.
sentences.chinese: 阐述玻璃幕墙杆索结构的有限分析计算方法。

sentences.english: Transparent glass curtain wall, full of people.
sentences.chinese: 透明的玻璃幕墙后，站满了人。

sentences.english: The large area of north-facing glass provides ample but diffused sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 朝北的大面积玻璃幕墙设计能令室内光线充足。

sentences.english: Series of VICCO glass curtain wall maintain consistent excellent quality.
sentences.chinese: 唯加玻璃幕墙系统保持了一贯的卓越品质。

sentences.english: Figure 1 shows the installation entity of new stone of the short-slot stone curtain wall.
sentences.chinese: 附图1为短槽式石材幕墙新石材安装实体示意图。

sentences.english: Huier's aluminum curtain wall plate manufacturing is the luminescent spot of the newest industry of Huier company.
sentences.chinese: 惠尔铝幕墙板制造是惠尔公司的最新产业亮点。

sentences.english: Luminosity glows through pale velum walls.
sentences.chinese: 耀眼的光芒透射着苍白的幕墙。

sentences.english: Glass curtain wall with point supporting system has undergone great development in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 点支式玻璃幕墙近年来得到了很快的发展。
